name: Half-Life (itch)
description:
Play as a carbon atom! How far can you go before your little atomic life radiates into nothingness? .... or till you get sucked by a black hole.

HALF-LIFE: in radioactive decay the half-life is the time after which there is a 50% chance that an atom undergoes nuclear decay.


Controls

  • Keyboard: A/D or Left/Right to Move
  • Mobile: Touch left/right of screen
